page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN KILWINNING
page.content: All over the area traces remain of the kinds of work no longer carried on.Many pits produced coal and the land is riddled with mine workings.ONE open cast mine still operates.Iron -was made -a huge works at Blacklands-and iron was worked -for an old factory still stands,rusty and decaying near the railway station.New industries came and an Industrial estate was established.Factories were built in other parts of the town.{PRODUCTS}cover a wide range, some highly technical-electronic cash registers,reclaiming silver and plastic from x-ray films,repair of electro- mechanical parts, power transmission engines and logging electric wireline and electronic analysis service to oil and gas indrustries.Old established factories like the {SPINNING COMPANY }remain.
